overview: Among the many designs for the motorcycle, the Triumph Bonneville is one of the most inspiring, a classic form that combined sleek sophistication with heavy-duty machinery. This engrossing documentary follows the history of the Triumph two-wheeler -- from its inception in 1959 to the design that continued to be produced well into the 1990s -- with stops along the way to illuminate the model's storied past and many different incarnations.
title: Story of the Triumph Bonneville
